C

Callback - Interface in com.stripe.stripeterminal
The Callback interface represents the simplest set of methods to run upon completion of an operation.
cancel(Callback) - Method in class com.stripe.stripeterminal.Cancelable
Attempt to cancel the operation.
Cancelable - Class in com.stripe.stripeterminal
A Cancelable represents an ongoing operation run by the Terminal SDK.
cancelPaymentIntent(PaymentIntent, PaymentIntentCallback) - Method in class com.stripe.stripeterminal.Terminal
Cancels a PaymentIntent.
clearConnectionToken() - Method in class com.stripe.stripeterminal.Terminal
Clears the current connection token.
collectPaymentMethod(PaymentIntent, ReaderInputListener, PaymentIntentCallback) - Method in class com.stripe.stripeterminal.Terminal
Collects a payment method for the given PaymentIntent.
com.stripe.example - package com.stripe.example
 
com.stripe.stripeterminal - package com.stripe.stripeterminal
 
confirmPaymentIntent(PaymentIntent, PaymentIntentCallback) - Method in class com.stripe.stripeterminal.Terminal
Confirms a PaymentIntent.
ConnectionStatus - Enum in com.stripe.stripeterminal
The ConnectionStatus represents the current state of the reader-terminal connection.
ConnectionTokenCallback - Interface in com.stripe.stripeterminal
The ConnectionTokenCallback will be used for the Stripe Terminal SDK to handle the result of the user's ConnectionTokenProvider.
ConnectionTokenException - Exception in com.stripe.stripeterminal
The ConnectionTokenException is an exception type that should be thrown by the ConnectionTokenProvider when there's an unresolvable error that prevents us from fetching a connection token
ConnectionTokenException(String) - Constructor for exception com.stripe.stripeterminal.ConnectionTokenException
Construct a ConnectionTokenException with only a message.
ConnectionTokenException(String, Throwable) - Constructor for exception com.stripe.stripeterminal.ConnectionTokenException
Construct a ConnectionTokenException with both a message and a cause.
ConnectionTokenProvider - Interface in com.stripe.stripeterminal
Before integrating the SDK, you should create an endpoint on your backend server that creates a new connection token via the Stripe Terminal API.
connectReader(Reader, ReaderCallback) - Method in class com.stripe.stripeterminal.Terminal
Attempts to connect to the given reader.
createIntent(Context, PaymentIntent) - Static method in class com.stripe.example.PaymentIntentActivity
Create an Intent for this activity class
createKeyedSource() - Method in class com.stripe.stripeterminal.Terminal
Creates a card source from keyed card information on the Android device.
createPaymentIntent(PaymentIntentParameters, PaymentIntentCallback) - Method in class com.stripe.stripeterminal.Terminal
